Posts.Content: Currently in 6th month of Hercepitn, with 6 to go, after 12 weekly Herceptin/Taxol treatments. Has anyone had any side effects from Herceptin? I have had joint stiffness, muscle soreness. Can anyone confirm similar effects? Now my eyebrows and lashes are starting to thin after they grew back. I currently take Arimidex.
Posts.Title: Herceptin (52 week study)
